firstNightReminder: During Demon info, show the Demon two good character tokens that are in play and two good character tokens marked IN-PLAY (instead of their normal bluffs).
otherNightReminder: If the Broker died today or tonight: üëÅ Show the Demon the character tokens marked IN-PLAY. (zzz)
name: Broker
ability: The Demon receives 4 bluffs, but 2 are in-play characters. If you die, they learn which are in play.

firstNightReminder: üëÅ Show the Tattletale the marked character tokens. (zzz)
name: Tattletale
ability: You start knowing 2 characters, exactly 1 of which is in play.

firstNightReminder: üëÅ Show the Postmaster any not-in-play character token. (zzz)
otherNightReminder: üëÅ Show the Postmaster any not-in-play character token. (zzz)
name: Postmaster
ability: Each night, you learn a not-in-play character.

firstNightReminder: üëÅ Show the hand signal (0, 1, 2, 3, or 4) for the number of alive Outsiders with at least one alive neighbor who is evil. (zzz)
otherNightReminder: üëÅ Show the hand signal (0, 1, 2, 3, or 4) for the number of alive Outsiders with at least one alive neighbor who is evil. (zzz)
name: Bootblack
ability: Each night, you learn how many alive Outsiders have at least one alive neighbor who is evil. [+1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Smuggler points to any number of players. (zzz) If more than 1 of them is evil, the Smuggler dies.
name: Smuggler
ability: Each night*, choose any number of players: if more than 1 is evil, you die.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Thespian points to a player. (zzz) If that player is the Demon, the Thespian dies and mark the center of the Grimoire ALL SAFE.
name: Thespian
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if they are the Demon, you die & no one else can die tonight.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Pessimist points to 2 players. If either player is, in your estimation, more likely to die tonight than the other, point to that player. Otherwise, shrug. (zzz)
name: Pessimist
ability: Each night*, choose 2 alive players: you learn which, if either, is more likely to die tonight.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Understudy points to a player. (zzz) Mark that player UNDERSTUDIED.
name: Understudy
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if they die tonight, you die instead & they learn that they were protected.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Matchmaker may point to 2 other alive players. (zzz) If the players are of different alignments, one of them dies.
name: Matchmaker
ability: Each night*, you may choose 2 alive players (not yourself): if they differ in alignment, one of them dies.

otherNightReminder: If a player died tonight: üëÅ Point to a player who died tonight. Point to the category of the pointed-to character on the Witness' character sheet. (zzz)
name: Witness
ability: Each night*, learn what type of character killed a specific player tonight. If you are chosen, you are drunk until dawn.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Lamplighter points to a player not themself. (zzz) Mark that player LIGHT SOURCE.
name: Lamplighter
ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they & players (other than yourself) who choose them cannot die tonight.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Chauffeur points to a player not themself & not the same as last night. (zzz) If that player is a Townsfolk, mark the Chauffeur SAFE.
name: Chauffeur
ability: Each night*, choose an alive player (not the same as last night & not yourself): if they are a Townsfolk, you cannot die tonight.

otherNightReminder: If the marked player did not respond truthfully today: they die.
name: Inquisitor
ability: Once per game, in day, publicly choose a player: they answer a yes/no question of your choice truthfully or die tonight.

otherNightReminder: You may choose that the player marked CHOSEN dies, even if for some reason they could not.
name: Snakebite
ability: You have a Townsfolk ability & think you are them. Each night*, a player you chose since dawn might die, even if they can't.

otherNightReminder: If the Pariah was executed today: üëÅ Show the "You are" card, then the thumb-down "evil" sign. (zzz)
name: Pariah
ability: If you are executed, you become evil.

name: Rabble-rouser
ability: If one of your alive neighbors chooses one or more players, you might be substituted for one of their choices.

otherNightReminder: If the Curator is marked with CHANGE TONIGHT: üëÅ Wake the Demon. Show the "This character selected you" card, then Curator token. The Demon either shows a "no" head signal or points to a non-Demon character on their sheet and a player. (zzz) If they did: Replace that player's character token with the chosen character token. üëÅ Wake that player. Show the "You are" card, then that player's new character token, then the hand sign (thumb-up "good", thumb-down "evil") for the player's current alignment. (zzz)
name: Curator
ability: If you died today or tonight, the Demon may choose a player & a non-Demon character they become (if not in play).

name: Omen
ability: Things you are "mad" about might come true.

otherNightReminder: If one or more players are marked with the Gorgon's DEAD markers: üëÅ Point to each of the marked players. The Gorgon may point to one of them. (zzz) The chosen player dies, if any. Remove DEAD markers from players to whom the Gorgon did not point.
name: Gorgon
ability: Each night*, you learn which players chose you (since dawn); you may choose 1 of them: they die.

otherNightReminder: If the Crescendo died by execution today: üëÅ The Crescendo nods "yes" or shakes "no" (zzz)  If they nodded "yes", mark the center of the Grimoire SUSPENDED.
name: Crescendo
ability: If you die by execution, tonight, you may decide that players who die tonight die tomorrow night instead, plus 1 extra.

name: Tarantella
ability: There is 1 alive poisoned player; you know their character. If chosen by Townsfolk, their poison moves to the chooser.

firstNightReminder: üëÅ The Deathgripp points to a player. (zzz) Mark that player CHOSEN.
otherNightReminder: If the played marked CHOSEN is dead: their alive good neighbors die. Otherwise: the marked player dies. üëÅ The Deathgripp points to a player. (zzz) Mark that player CHOSEN.
name: Deathgripp
ability: Each night, choose an alive player. If the player you chose last night is alive, they die. If not, their good living neighbors die.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Grist points to a player. (zzz) That player dies.
name: Grist
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you are killed by an ability, a Minion becomes an evil Grist.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Veni Vidi Vici points to a player. (zzz) That player dies.  If they kill themself & no Outsiders live, evil wins.
name: Veni Vidi Vici
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself and no Outsiders live, evil wins instead. [exactly 3 Outsiders]

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Spree shakes their head "no" or, any number of times, points to a player, then a good character on their sheet. (zzz) If all of their guesses were correct, all chosen players die (in that order). If the Spree did not choose anyone, you choose a player to die.
name: Spree
ability: Each night*, choose any number of players and their good characters: if correct, they all die. If you chose no-one, a player dies.
